text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Fortnite and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the Alienware AW17R5-7108SLV 17.3'' FHD IPS GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the Alienware AW17R5-7108SLV 17.3'' FHD IPS GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is solid, and the speakers is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 in the Alienware AW17R5-7108SLV 17.3'' FHD IPS GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
